eclasstool.model.chat

Class Chatroom

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.chat.Chatroom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Chatroom
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Chatroom is a room inside the Chatbox. It has a Members component to indicate the users in the room. It has a comments component to store Members' posts (Strings) onto the chatroom.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> comments
      The comments made in this chatroom.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Member> members
      The members in this chatroom.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chatroom()
      Constructs a new chatroom with blank users and comments.

      • getComments

        public java.lang.String getComments()
        GetComments returns posted comments in this chatroom.
        Returns:
        the packed list of comments into a single string

      • addComment

        public void addComment(Member member,
              java.lang.String message)
        AddComment adds the given message to this.comments with the given member's name.
        Parameters:
        member - the member that is posting onto chatroom
        message - the message to comment

      • addQuestion

        public void addQuestion(java.lang.String question)
        AddQuestion adds a question to the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        question - the question to post to the chatroom

      • addMember

        public void addMember(Chat chat,
             Member member)
        AddMember adds the given member to this.members.
        Parameters:
        chat - the chat the given member is in
        member - the member to add onto this chatroom

      • removeMember

        public void removeMember(Member member)
        RemoveMember removes the given member from this.members. This will only be called once the given member decides to leave the chatroom.
        Parameters:
        member - the member to remove
